title: Collaborative Team-Based Online Mathematics Lecture Design Workshop

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level knowledge and practical experience in the relevant field
context.additional_context: Learners are adult citizens with intermediate expertise in mathematics education. Digital devices (tablets, laptops) are provided, and learning outcomes are measured through project-based assessments.

learning_goals: Learners can explain the online math lecture design process in three or more stages using a collaborative team-based design model.
Learners can recognize three or more communication barriers between technical and content experts in online instructional design and propose solutions.
Learners can complete a project-based online lecture design plan by collaborating with team members based on real math education scenarios.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
